participant_1.background:
I enjoy relaxing in my free time by watching cartoons.
I like to do things that take my mind off the past.
I try to go for a walk every day, but it can be difficult because I can't see well.
my favorite hobby is reading suspense novels.
I've been secretly watching baseball games all year, even though my parents don't like it.

i love to cut down trees.
sometimes i wish i did not have to wake up in the morning.
I love to tinker with my convertible car and take it for a spin on the weekends.
i work for the discovery channel creating videos.

content.text: I like to relax in my free time by watching cartoons.
What's your favorite cartoon? Mine is Adventure Time.
I like Adventure Time too! I also like Spongebob Squarepants and Steven Universe.
Steven Universe is great! I like how it's so positive and uplifting.
Yeah, it's a really good show. I also like how it has a lot of representation for different types of people.
I agree. It's important for kids to see themselves represented in media.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read suspense novels, go for walks, and play video games.
I like to read suspense novels too! What's your favorite one?
My favorite suspense novel is The Girl on the Train.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
